  [38;2;153;153;153mcommunication [39m

  [38;2;153;153;153m‚è∫ In Layman's Terms: Web Crawling with Real-Time Progress [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m  What is Web Crawling? [39m

  [38;2;153;153;153mdocumentation [39m

  [38;2;153;153;153m  automatically. Instead of you copying and pasting docs, the system goes [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153mand reads everything [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m   for you. [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m  Example Scenario: [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m  Say you're building something with React. Instead of manually feeding [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153mReact documentation to [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m   your AI, you just: [39m

  [38;2;153;153;153m  3. Reads and stores all the information [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m  4. Now your AI knows everything about React [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m  What Makes Your Implementation Special: [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m  Archon's Way (Basic): [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m  - You click "Crawl website" [39m

  [38;2;153;153;153m  The Technical Magic (Simply Put): [39m
  [38;2;153;153;153m  Your WebSocket connection (the real-time communication channel you already[39m
